shader.description: This contains shader name.  VRM/MToon, VRM/UnlitTransparentZWrite, and VRM_USE_GLTFSHADER (and legacy materials as Standard, UniGLTF/UniUnlit, VRM/UnlitTexture, VRM/UnlitCutout, VRM/UnlitTransparent) . If VRM_USE_GLTFSHADER is specified, use same index of gltf's material settings
